decision_conditions: <p dir="ltr" id="docs-internal-guid-27fd2655-7fff-7dbd-88cf-0597b9940396" style="margin-top: 0pt; margin-bottom: 0pt; line-height: 1.38;"><span style="font-size: 11pt; font-family: Arial; background-color: transparent; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap;">No permission is granted for the removal of any original plasterwork. All new decorative plasterwork (including cornices and ceiling roses) shall accurately replicate, in terms of material. profile and detailing of the historic plasterwork surviving to the property or where this does not survive to a comparable house forming part of the De Beauvoir Square.&nbsp;</span></p><p><br></p><p dir="ltr" style="margin-top: 0pt; margin-bottom: 0pt; line-height: 1.38;"><span style="font-size: 11pt; font-family: Arial; background-color: transparent; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap;">REASON: To ensure that special regard is paid to protecting the special architectural and historic interest and integrity of the listed building.</span></p>

<p dir="ltr" id="docs-internal-guid-16b15f69-7fff-58b3-df56-920fadf2de12" style="margin-top: 0pt; margin-bottom: 0pt; line-height: 1.38;"><span style="font-size: 11pt; font-family: Arial; background-color: transparent; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap;">All new works, and works of making good to the retained fabric, whether internal or external, shall be finished to match the original work with regard to the methods used and to material, dimensions, composition, form, colour, finish and profile, and in the case of brickwork, facebond and pointing.</span></p><p><br></p><p dir="ltr" style="margin-top: 0pt; margin-bottom: 0pt; line-height: 1.38;"><span style="font-size: 11pt; font-family: Arial; background-color: transparent; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap;">REASON: To ensure that special regard is paid to protecting the special architectural and historic interest and integrity of the listed building.</span></p>

<p dir="ltr" id="docs-internal-guid-cc5896bc-7fff-6f9e-4abd-9d6993a628f1" style="margin-top: 0pt; margin-bottom: 0pt; line-height: 1.38;"><span style="font-size: 11pt; font-family: Arial; background-color: transparent; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap;">No cleaning of masonry, other than low pressure (20-100 psi) surface cleaning using a nebulous water spray is authorised by this consent without the prior approval of the Local Planning Authority.&nbsp; Before work begins, any other cleaning proposals must be approved in writing and carried out strictly in accordance with those details. At the commencement of the cleaning, a test panel shall be undertaken in an inconspicuous position and the method recorded to the approval of the Local Planning Authority.&nbsp; The works shall not be carried out otherwise than in accordance with the approved details.</span></p><p><br></p><p dir="ltr" style="margin-top: 0pt; margin-bottom: 0pt; line-height: 1.38;"><span style="font-size: 11pt; font-family: Arial; background-color: transparent; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap;">REASON: To ensure that special regard is paid to protecting the special architectural and historic interest and integrity of the listed building. </span></p>

The Development hereby permitted shall only be carried out and completed strictly in accordance with the submitted plans hereby approved and any subsequent approval of details.


REASON: To ensure that the development hereby permitted is carried out in full accordance with the plans hereby approved.

The Development hereby permitted must be begun not later than the expiration of three years beginning with the date of this consent.


REASON: In order to comply with the provisions of Section 18(a) of the Planning (Listed Buildings and Conservation Areas) Act 1990 as amended.
description: Works at no. 9 comprising the removal of external store; erection of single storey rear extension; internal alterations; replacement screen and gate to the side of the property; re-tiling of roof with natural slate and installation of conservation rooflight; replacement front door, alterations to side fenestration at lower ground floor; erection of a cycle store; alterations to boundary treatment along shared boundary with no. 8. Works to no. 10 comprising re-tiling of roof with natural slate (AMENDED)
